name: Rika (Pokemon) LoRA
description:
I just finished beating Pokemon: Scarlet today and decided to make Rika.

This is a LoRA for Rika from Pokemon.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

These Images were generated with AbyssOrangeMix3_A1 and OrangeMix VAE. This was trained on the NAI Model and only tested on AOM3 and Corneo's 7th Mix.

I used on Hires. fix on all of the pictures using these settings - I'm not sure if they're the best so if you have any suggestions for Hires! Leave them in the comments!

R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B, Upscaled by 1.25, Hires. Steps - 0 and Denoising at 0.1

Small Fixes (Optional)

You can add these tags to help it generate a little better but it's entirely optional, if you wish to save tokens.

Add ponytail in the prompt because sometimes it will generate two ponytails and this will help it.

Add hair over one eye because sometimes the eye will clip through the hair - This can fix that but most of the time without it - It works well.

If you wish to place her in her traditional clothes, add this in the prompt with the LoRA - collared shirt, pants, suspenders, necktie, earrings.

She works best in her traditional clothes.

Embeds and LoRAs used - Bad Prompt

Be sure to leave a review, comment and check out my other LoRAs - You might see something you like here.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
